entity.name: Sonny Perdue
entity.description: US Secretary of Agriculture Sonny Perdue

text:
@realDonaldTrump @SecretarySonny @ZippyDuvall Great idea! Federal support to match supply & demand when the people haven’t received their #COVID19 checks or Unemployment $$ 

We were trying to do it on our own so the dumping would stop & to provide food for the long lines of the hungry. Federal government coordination helps.
